channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: How I Landed My First iOS Job
item.description: About a year ago I started learning swift with absolutely zero prior programming experience, and recently landed my first job. I wanted to give back to this community and share my experience — what worked for me, and what didn’t. Feel free to ask my anything or share your own insights. Getting Started with iOS Paul Hudson has an excellent tutorial series called 100 Days of SwiftUI that starts at the absolute beginning.
